meanings.definition: The state or quality of being querulous.
meanings.sent1: Her constant querulousnesses made it difficult to have a peaceful conversation.
meanings.sent2: I could not stand his querulousnesses about the weather anymore.
meanings.sent3: The querulousnesses of the cat demanding more treats was both annoying and amusing.
meanings.sent4: The querulousnesses of the old house creaking in the wind sounded like a chorus of complaints.
meanings.sent5: The querulousnesses of the toddler's whining echoed through the house.

meanings.definition: The tendency to complain or grumble.
meanings.sent1: His constant querulousnesses about the food at the restaurant annoyed everyone.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't help but express her querulousnesses about the long wait in line.
meanings.sent3: The querulousnesses of the students over the homework assignment was met with eye rolls.
meanings.sent4: The querulousnesses of the car engine signaled an impending breakdown.
meanings.sent5: The querulousnesses of the customer over the service reached a new level of irritation.
